title: From Brooklyn to the Gulag
description: Sana Krasikov talks about her debut novel, "The Patriots"; and Michael Sims discusses "Arthur and Sherlock: Conan Doyle and the Creation of Holmes."
author: books@nytimes.com (The New York Times)
